name: CodusSoft
tag_list: web-development, ecommerce, joomla, drupal, wordpress, php, vbulletin, e-bay, lms, web-design, -net, oracle
overview:
Codus Sofware is Ukrainian web- and software development company. Our wide expertise in delivering projects of any complexity (from simple websites to complex scalable high loaded systems) is aimed each time to bring customer satisfaction.

Web portals, web galleries, web shops, auction websites, ordering and delivering services, custom CMS, online courses, learning management systems (LMS), searchable online directories, social networking sites, hotel and tickets booking systems, open-source CMS customization, back-office and enterprise automation systems, website graphic design, complex user interface design and usability design, jointless integration of complex web systems and reengineering are all among the sphere of our competency.

Whatever issue you have â€“ building a website from scratch or customizing an open-source application, we will deliver it in the shortest terms and the highest quality. Start any most challenging project with us and perceive the benefits for yourself!
